name: Reminisce (Daniella-Atterano)
description:
You have just lost the love of your life and now you must continue with your life in a world filled with death and obstacles. You must collect letters written by your partner to ‘reminisce’ back to the memories the two of you had together and to overcome the grief that has struck upon you and live on with your life.

https://www.instagram.com/d_atterano_art/

Controls:

To move - left and right on arrow keys

To climb (up and down ladders) - up and down on arrow keys

Exit out of game - press escape key

To finish cutscene - press enter key
